amendment.description: Amendment makes permanent a set aside of Army Corps priority funding for the Great Lakes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Huizenga (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
